Name: nya-alhajiyusufmuha
Author: Al Haji Yusuf Muhammad Kanyamula
Source: http://goodwordbooks.com/, Goodword Books, Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africa

Translations.Text: Pamene thambo lidzang’ambika
Ndipo limva ndi kumvera Ambuye wake ndipo ling’ambikadi
Pamene nthaka idzatambasulidwa
Ndi kutulutsa zonse zimene zinakwiriridwa m’kati mwake ndi kukhala yopanda kanthu
Ndipo limva ndi kumvera Ambuye wake ndipo ling’ambikadi
oh iwe munthu! Ndithudi iwe uli kubwerera kupita kwa Ambuye wako ndi ntchito zako. Kubwerera kotsimikizidwa. Motero udzakumana nazo
Koma Iye amene adzapatsidwa Buku lake m’dzanja lamanja
Adzawerengedwa mosavuta
Ndipo adzabwerera kwa anthu ake ndi chisangalalo
Koma iye amene adzapatsidwa buku lake kumbuyo kwake
Iye adzalira
Ndipo akalowa ku moto walawi – lawi ku Gahena
Ndithudi iye adali wansangala pakati pa anthu ake
Ndithudi iye anali kuganiza kuti sadzabwerera kwa Mulungu
Inde! Ndithudi Ambuye wake anali kuona zonse zimene iye ankachita
Ine ndilumbira pali kufiira kwa kulowa kwa dzuwa
Ndi pali usiku ndi zonse zimene umabweretsa mu mdima
Ndi pali mwezi pamene ufika pa chimake penipeni
Ndipo inu, ndithudi, mudzayenda kupita kutsogolo, kuchoka apa ndi kufika apo
Kodi ndi chifukwa chiyani choti iwo alibe chikhulupiriro
Ndipo pamene Korani ili kuwerengedwa kwa iwo sagwa pansi. Al-Buruj
Iyayi! Koma anthu osakhulupirira amalikana
Ndipo Mulungu amadziwa zinthu zonse zimene amasonkhanitsa
Choncho auze iwo za chilango chowawa
Kupatula okhawo amene akhulupirira ndi kumachita ntchito zabwino, chifukwa iwo ali ndi malipiro opanda malire
Pali kumwamba kumene kuli nyenyezi zikulu zikulu
Pali tsiku lolonjezedwa
Pali tsiku la umboni ndi tsiku loperekedwa umboni
wotembereredwa anali anthu amene anakumba ngalande
Imene munali moto woyaka
Pamene akhala moizungulira
Ndipo iwo adachitira umboni pa zomwe amachitira anthu okhulupirira
Iwo analibe mlandu wina uliwonse ndi anthuwa kupatula kuti anali kukhulupirira mwa Mulungu mmodzi yekha, Mwini mphamvu zonse, Mwini kuyamikidwa
Mwini Ufumu wakumwamba ndi dziko lapansi! Ndipo Mulungu ndi mboni pa chilichonse
Ndithudi onse amene adazunza amuna okhulupirira, ndi akazi okhulupilira ndipo salapa machimo awo, adzalandira chilango chowawa cha moto woyaka wa ku Gahena
Ndithu onse amene akhulupirira ndi kuchita ntchito zabwino adzakhala m’minda imene ili ndi mitsinje ya madzi oyenda. Kumeneko ndiko kupambana kwakukulu
Ndithudi chilango cha Ambuye wako ndi chowawa
Ndithudi Iye ndiye amene amayambitsa chilengedwe ndipo adzachibwereza patsiku louka kwa akufa
Ndipo Iye ndi wokhululuka ndi wachikondi chodzadza
Mwini wake wa Mpando wachifumu, Wolemekezeka
Iye amachita chimene afuna
Kodi iwe siudamve za asirikali
A Farao ndi a Thamoud
Iyayi! Koma anthu osakhulupirira amazikana
Ndipo Mulungu amawazungulira onse
Iyayi! Ili ndi Buku loyera la Korani
Lolembedwa m’Buku lotetezedwa
Pali kumwamba ndi pali Nyenyezi yowala
Kodi chidzakudziwitsa kuti Nyenyezi yowala ndi chiani
Ndi Nyenyezi yowala kothobwetsa maso
Ndithudi moyo uliwonse uli ndi mtetezi wake
Tamulekani munthu kuti aganize kuti adalengedwa kuchokera ku chiyani
Iye adalengedwa kuchokera ku madzi otuluka
Amene amatuluka kuchokera pakati pa pfupa la munsana ndi nthiti
Ndithudi Iye ali ndi mphamvu zomudzutsa
Pa tsiku limene zinthu zobisika zidzayesedwa
Ndipo adzakhala wopanda mphamvu kapena womuthandiza
Pali mtambo umene umapereka mvula kawiri kawiri
Ndi pali dziko lapansi limene limang’ambika
Ndithudi! Awa ndi mawu amene amasiyanitsa
Si nthabwala ayi
Ndithudi iwo Al-A’la	649 ali kukonza chiwembu
Ndipo Inenso ndili kukonza chiwembu
Motero apatse nthawi anthu osakhulupirira. Ndipo chita nawo mwamtendere pa kanthawi kochepa
